oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US Model 1863 cavalry bit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a US Model 1863 cavalry bit. The bit was used during the Civil War by Capt. Asa Hayes, Co. C, 7th Tenn. Cav., USA. He lived in both Henederson and Decatur Counties, Tenn. The 7th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA was composed of men from West Tennessee. The regiment served mainly in West Tenn. and many were captured during the attack on Union City, Tenn. on March 24, 1864. Asa Hayes reportedly had 64 children and three wives.
